name: Breakpod
description:
You're a pod of peas fighting off cacti! Use your arsenal of weapons wisely, as everything breaks with one use.

CONTROLS: Move with WASD and use your MOUSE to aim - left mouse button will use the currently equipped item, right click will drop whatever your carrying. Points are awarded by defeating cacti. The game gets more difficult as your score increases.

Made for the 2019 GMTK 'only one' Game Jam.
